abstract: With the sector under pressure, Superior Energy Services agreed to buy a rival, Complete Production Services, for about $2.7 billion.
snippet: With the sector under pressure, Superior Energy Services agreed to buy a rival, Complete Production Services, for about $2.7 billion.
lead_paragraph: Superior Energy Services, an oil field services company based in New Orleans, agreed to buy a rival, Complete Production Services, for about $2.7 billion.

headline.main: Superior Energy to Acquire Complete for $2.7 Billion
